mapper.insert: insert into scan ( uuid, category, name, start_time, end_time, status, result_summary, repo_id, commit_id, commit_time ) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{category}, #{name}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{status}, #{result_summary}, #{repo_id}, #{commit_id}, #{commit_time} )
mapper.delete: delete from scan where repo_id=#{repo_id} and category = #{category}
mapper.select: select commit_id from scan where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} and end_time = (select max(end_time) from scan where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category});
select commit_time from scan where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} order by end_time desc limit 1;
select count(uuid) from scan where repo_id = #{repo_id} and commit_id = #{commit_id} and category = #{category}
select * from scan where repo_id=#{repo_id} and category = #{category} order by commit_time
